497.<voice 01293_00000497><start_lip_sync n0:

498.<voice 01345_00000498><start_lip_sync n0:

499.<voice 01375_00000499><start_lip_sync n0:

501.<voice 01640_00000501><start_lip_sync n0:

617.<voice 00857_00000617><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000617><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I'm back!

618.<voice 00980_00000618><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00980_00000618><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Yeah.
Your illness is cured!
You toughed it out!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

619.<voice 01043_00000619><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01043_00000619><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Thank God!
Just in time for father's birthday...
We can celebrate it together!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

624.<voice 01655_00000624><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01655_00000624><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Are you okay?
You're still sick?<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

627.<voice 00535_00000627><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00535_00000627><start_lip_sync n00026 _normal m00001>Are you all right?
Something seems odd...<stop_lip_animation n00026 CLOSE_MOUTH>

630.<voice 00967_00000630><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00967_00000630><start_lip_sync n00097 _normal m00001>Agushuna, If you run like that,
you'll hurt yourself again.<stop_lip_animation n00097 CLOSE_MOUTH>

631.<voice 01165_00000631><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01165_00000631><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I'm fine, dear.

633.<voice 01305_00000633><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01305_00000633><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Mother's looking so much better!<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

634.<voice 01355_00000634><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01355_00000634><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>I think mother getting well was a
little bit of an early birthday
present from God to our father.<stop_lip_animation n00050 CLOSE_MOUTH>

637.<voice 01605_00000637><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01605_00000637><start_lip_sync n00050 _normal m00001>Here, do you want some cake?

640.<voice 02095_00000640><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02095_00000640><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Sister was slowly going mad...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

641.<voice 02155_00000641><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02155_00000641><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>As mother's condition improved,
she grew to hate her...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

642.<voice 02235_00000642><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02235_00000642><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>And that led to the tragedy of

643.<voice 02295_00000643><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02295_00000643><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Why did Princess Rita hate Queen

644.<voice 02357_00000644><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02357_00000644><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I don't know...
I thought she wanted our mother

645.<voice 02475_00000645><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02475_00000645><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I wonder if the leaf of the Dark Tree
will reveal anything to me...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000706.<voice 00240_19000706><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00240_19000706><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>...Huh? Kyusuke?
Did you say something?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000707.<voice 00420_19000707><start_lip_sync n0:

650.<voice 00575_00000650><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00575_00000650><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>...I'm late. Please forgive me for

651.<voice 00645_00000651><start_lip_sync n0:

652.<voice 00951_00000652><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00951_00000652><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Whoa, what the!?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

653.<voice 01080_00000653><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01080_00000653><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>This... Is this...?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

655.<voice 01201_00000655><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01201_00000655><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>No way... Oh, my!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

656.<voice 01214_00000656><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01214_00000656><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Oh, Nikoroi!?

658.<voice 01380_00000658><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01380_00000658><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>There's no mistaking it...

659.<voice 01510_00000659><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01510_00000659><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Apparently, I've put you through a lot.

660.<voice 01620_00000660><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01620_00000660><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>So, Nikoroi, who are these people...?<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

661.<voice 01670_00000661><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01670_00000661><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I'm here with Kyusuke and <pc>.

662.<voice 01686_00000662><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01686_00000662><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>These men have brought me the
leaf of the Dark Tree...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

663.<voice 01780_00000663><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01780_00000663><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Oh... Is that so? Thanks to you, I've
woken up from a long sleep...

665.<voice 01950_00000665><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01950_00000665><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Tell me!
Tell me what happened in this
castle on that day 50 years ago!<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

666.<voice 02065_00000666><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02065_00000666><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi, you're very fond of your sister
Rita. The truth is, the less you

667.<voice 02130_00000667><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02130_00000667><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>I am no longer a young child.
Please, tell me the truth.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

669.<voice 02260_00000669><start_lip_sync n0:
Nikoroi. You remember that Rita was one of the White Ones with the power to communicate with the Holy
Land, don't you?

670.<voice 02325_00000670><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02325_00000670><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Rita wanted to harness her power to
communicate with the Holy Land to
take the Holy Land's power for herself.<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

671.<voice 02430_00000671><start_lip_sync n0:
I don't know why she'd want to do something like that. By the time King Nashuroi and I figured it out, it was too
late...

672.<voice 02460_00000672><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02460_00000672><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Rita took in more than she could handle.

28549.<voice 02510_00028549><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02510_00028549><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I barely escaped with my life, but
Rita's power sealed me in this
place for 50 years...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

673.<voice 02600_00000673><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02600_00000673><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Oh, my... How horrifying.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

674.<voice 02661_00000674><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02661_00000674><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi, as a member of the royal
family, you must fulfill our mission

675.<voice 02720_00000675><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02720_00000675><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The Holy Land is... this land's strength.

9256.<voice 02760_00009256><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02760_00009256><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>If that land falls into the hands of evil,
this continent will be doomed to

676.<voice 02790_00000676><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02790_00000676><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>What will happen to the Holy Land,

9257.<voice 02820_00009257><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02820_00009257><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Nikoroi, Do you still have the Golden

29814.<voice 02835_00029814><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02835_00029814><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The ring is the key that opens the door

677.<voice 02890_00000677><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02890_00000677><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>If it's the golden ring you had,

We must go at once to the royal garden.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

678.<voice 03040_00000678><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03040_00000678><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001><pc>, Kyusuke, come with
me to the royal garden.<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29815.<voice 03100_00029815><start_lip_sync n0:
The Royal Garden is the garden behind the castle, but it's blocked by sand and soil now. We'll have
to make a detour to get there.

679.<voice 03141_00000679><start_lip_sync n0:
First, we'll go outside the walls. Then we'll go through the ruins of the northern residence and follow the
signs to the royal garden in the back.

680.<voice 03250_00000680><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03250_00000680><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Mother, do you have a moment?
Actually, I have a theory about why
my sister wanted power...<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

681.<voice 03499_00000681><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03499_00000681><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>Oh my, what a surprise.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

682.<voice 03529_00000682><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03529_00000682><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>I didn't think that the queen,
who was thought to be dead,
would show up like this.<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

684.<voice 03606_00000684><start_lip_sync n0:
Well then, let's go! Once we're outside the walls, we'll head north past the ruins of the
dwellings to the royal garden beyond!

9258.<voice 00030_00009258><start_lip_sync n0:
You're , aren't you? I heard that you and King Nikoroi found out about Princess Rita at
the abandoned castle.

9259.<voice 00068_00009259><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00068_00009259><start_lip_sync n00385 _normal m00001>You old coot! Don't speak the
name of that abominable princess...
You'll bring bad luck!<stop_lip_animation n00385 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9261.<voice 00271_00009261><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00271_00009261><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Well, Princess Rita was a very
smart and kind girl...<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9262.<voice 00286_00009262><start_lip_sync n0:
We used to fight all the time, and we were never honest with each other, but it was Princess Rita who brought
us together, right?

9263.<voice 00301_00009263><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00301_00009263><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>She'd say 'you look so good together'
with an innocent smile. That smile
made us honest.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9264.<voice 00328_00009264><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00328_00009264><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>But when the gentle princess turned
violent, everyone feared it was fate, a
curse... and abandoned the castle.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9265.<voice 00368_00009265><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00368_00009265><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>I was just a young soldier when
that tragedy occurred. I can still see
it in my mind's eye...<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9266.<voice 00398_00009266><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00398_00009266><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>After the attack on Lady Agushuna...
Princess Rita came to her senses, and

9267.<voice 00428_00009267><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00428_00009267><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Later, they found Princess Rita's shoes

9268.<voice 00482_00009268><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00482_00009268><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>At the time, I was terrified, and all
I could think about was how far away

9269.<voice 00512_00009269><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00512_00009269><start_lip_sync n00384 _normal m00001>Now, I think that... it was Princess
Rita who was suffering the most.<stop_lip_animation n00384 CLOSE_MOUTH>

701.<voice 00204_00000701><start_lip_sync n0:
I... I can remember now... This royal garden was my sister's favorite place. We used to play
here together as children.

702.<voice 00400_00000702><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00400_00000702><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I've never been able to figure out

703.<voice 00499_00000703><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00499_00000703><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>When you showed me the diary that

704.<voice 00577_00000704><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00577_00000704><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>The reason she sought the power of
the Holy Land...
Was to cure me of my illness...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

705.<voice 00693_00000705><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00693_00000705><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Oh, my God... Poor Rita...<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

707.<voice 00857_00000707><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000707><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>No, I'm fine... I'm more concerned

714.<voice 01076_00000714><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01076_00000714><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Well, <cs_pchero>.

715.<voice 01101_00000715><start_lip_sync n0:

717.<voice 00051_00000717><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00051_00000717><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>This is the Holy Land...?<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

718.<voice 00294_00000718><start_lip_sync n0:

719.<voice 00339_00000719><start_lip_sync n0:

720.<voice 00404_00000720><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00404_00000720><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>Mother, what is that tree?<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

723.<voice 00629_00000723><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00629_00000723><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Heh heh heh... Poor little Nikoroi!<stop_lip_animation n00134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

724.<voice 00684_00000724><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00684_00000724><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>I wonder if you got that gullibility

726.<voice 00857_00000726><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00857_00000726><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Fifty years... How long it's been!

727.<voice 01011_00000727><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01011_00000727><start_lip_sync n00134 _normal m00001>Now the continent of Eltona will

728.<voice 01066_00000728><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01066_00000728><start_lip_sync n00133 _normal m00001>You... Who the hell are you?!<stop_lip_animation n00133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

729.<voice 01150_00000729><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01150_00000729><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>I am Araniad... I was born from

continent with death and despair...<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

730.<voice 01246_00000730><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01246_00000730><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>My dear Nikoroi, were you happy to
see your mother? Did you feel like
you had your family back?<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

731.<voice 01285_00000731><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01285_00000731><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>Hee hee hee... Your sickly mother
left this world a long time ago.
I'm the one who killed her.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

732.<voice 01315_00000732><start_lip_sync n0:
I have entered this castle in the guise of your mother to obtain the Golden Ring that would open the door to the
Holy Land.

733.<voice 01765_00000733><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01765_00000733><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>But Rita, she's the only one who
saw through my clever deception.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9279.<voice 01795_00009279><start_lip_sync n0:
Was it her fate as the White One...? She tried to cast me out by herself. She didn't even tell anyone that her
mother had been murdered.

734.<voice 01825_00000734><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01825_00000734><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>It was a mistake to underestimate
her power.<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000708.<voice 02285_19000708><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02285_19000708><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>That girl...! Just when I thought I'd killed
that weak King Nashuroi and finally
gotten my hands on the Golden Ring...!<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

735.<voice 02345_00000735><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02345_00000735><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>She traded her life to keep me
here for 50 years!<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9281.<voice 02405_00009281><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02405_00009281><start_lip_sync n01672 _normal m00001>But no more!
My hope is now fulfilled!
The heart of Eltona is in my hands!<stop_lip_animation n01672 CLOSE_MOUTH>

736.<voice 02561_00000736><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 02561_00000736><start_lip_sync m50020 _normal m00001>I must thank you both.
You freed me from the seal and
brought me to this holy place.<stop_lip_animation m50020 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9282.<voice 02690_00009282><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 02690_00009282><start_lip_sync m50020 _normal m00001>Therefore, I sentence you to an

737.<voice 02831_00000737><start_lip_sync m5:
<voice 02831_00000737><start_lip_sync m50020 _normal m00001>Now, I will crush you with all my might!

19000709.<voice 00110_19000709><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00110_19000709><start_lip_sync n00213 _normal m00001>King Nikoroi is fine! Let's defeat him this time!<stop_lip_animation n00213 CLOSE_MOUTH>

742.<voice 00090_00000742><start_lip_sync m5: <voice 00090_00000742><start_lip_sync m50020 _normal m00001>Impossible... I've been defeated?<stop_lip_animation m50020 CLOSE_MOUTH>

744.<voice 00303_00000744><start_lip_sync m5:

745.<voice 00345_00000745><start_lip_sync m5:

747.<voice 00650_00000747><start_lip_sync n0:

748.<voice 00690_00000748><start_lip_sync n0:

751.<voice 01180_00000751><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01180_00000751><start_lip_sync n00094 _normal m00001>Ah... I understand now...<stop_lip_animation n00094 CLOSE_MOUTH>

752.<voice 01230_00000752><start_lip_sync n0:

753.<voice 01330_00000753><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01330_00000753><start_lip_sync n00094 _normal m00001>Thank you...
